snippet.title: Optical Illusion Perspective-Based Puzzle Gameplay: Museum of Simulation Technology
snippet.description:
Remember last year's tech demo for Pillow Castle's first person puzzler? Here's some gameplay of the project that tech demo evolved into: Museum of Simulation Technology, now touting a completely refreshed art style. 

SUBSCRIBE! http://goo.gl/qw3Ac7

Check out our full video catalog: http://goo.gl/Cqt2cn
Visit our playlists: http://goo.gl/pM7TNe
Like Polygon on Facebook: https://goo.gl/GmkOs4

Read more at: http://www.polygon.com
